column2: For bond buyers, the risks of betting on China's troubled developers may be worth the double-digit yields on offer.
column4: Defaults Have Begun in China. Which Names Will Survive?

column2: Q.: I just got a $7,000 dividend from a mutual fund that usually only pays small dividends and is now only worth about $62,000. First, whenever a stock or a fund pays out a dividend, the value of the holding is adjusted down. The same thing happens when a company pays a dividend.
column4: I just got a huge dividend payout from a mutual fund and my investment value dropped — what’s going on?
